description: Startinstance response elements shown as below: "   req-5970ccd7-c763-456c-89f0-5b55ea18880b   true " But as per the AWS API reference doc, the response elements shown be as below: == 59dbff89-35bd-4eac-99ed-be587EXAMPLE i-10a64379 0 pending 80 stopped === here, information missing in the response elements.
title: [EC2] StartInstance response missing instanceset info

comments.content: Startinstance response elements shown as below: " req-5970ccd7-c763-456c-89f0-5b55ea18880b true " But as per the AWS API reference doc, the response elements shown be as below: == 59dbff89-35bd-4eac-99ed-be587EXAMPLE i-10a64379 64 stopping 16 running === here, information missing in the response elements.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~swamireddy

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/95799
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Verified that the Amazon API WSDL for both the 2013-10-15 version (which OpenStack EC2 endpoint advertises) and 2014-02-01 version (from bug post) use the instancesSet XML element
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content:
Jay - Thanks for review.
Yep, the fix include the <instanceSet> XML elements with <instanceID>, <currentState> and <previousState> Items.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~swamireddy

comments.content: Reviewed: https://review.openstack.org/100438 Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=37520a7dc14971b2d244f37febdb9fb13edbfd2f Submitter: Jenkins Branch: master commit 37520a7dc14971b2d244f37febdb9fb13edbfd2f Author: Swami Reddy Date: Wed Jun 18 15:49:18 2014 +0530 Add instanceset info to StartInstance response Currently startinstance response doesn't have the instanceset information with InstanceID, current state and previous state. It just returns the "True". As per the AWS API reference document, the StartInstance response elements should include the instanceset information as below: req-a7326465-5ce2-4ed6-ab89-394b38cca85f i-00000001 16 running 80 stopped Included the instanceset in to startinstance response elements and updated the test cases for startinstance response elements in nova/tests/api/ec2/test_cloud.py file. Change-Id: I08ef7ed88f983b66a30c76d6b7b754222097a03b Closes-bug: #1321220
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
